references.paper_title: Frozen in time: A joint video and image encoder for end-to-end retrieval
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of image-to-video generation, introducing a joint video and image encoder for end-to-end retrieval, which has heavily influenced subsequent research.

references.paper_title: Videocrafter1: Open diffusion models for high-quality video generation
references.reason: This paper introduced Videocrafter1, an important model that heavily inspired VidCRAFT3, which has advanced the state-of-the-art in image-to-video generation using diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Animatediff: Animate your personalized text-to-image diffusion models without specific tuning
references.reason: This method extended pre-trained text-to-image models to the video domain, influencing VidCRAFT3's approach to incorporating image information into its video generation process.

references.paper_title: Image conductor: Precision control for interactive video synthesis
references.reason: This paper tackled the problem of fine-grained control in video synthesis which influenced VidCRAFT3's objective of achieving simultaneous control over multiple visual elements.
This paper's method of 3D reconstruction from a single image is crucial for VidCRAFT3's camera motion control, enabling precise rendering of point clouds along user-defined trajectories.
